name: Vexdrift
description:
Grab onto orbits of evil microplanets! Maneuver to turn them against each other.

Your trusty space hook can grab onto anything!
Ride your enemies, exploiting their aggression - they will always try to attack YOU!
But beware: you aren't safe when attached! Turn your orbit backwards to avoid hazards.

Leftclick / Spacebar / E / Gamepad A- Throw hook!
Rightclick / Ctrl / W / Gamepad X - Change spinning direction
R / Gamepad Y - Restart
